data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_WindowTitleDatasource
data.value: Data Source Wizard

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_WindowTitleReport
data.value: Report Wizard

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_AddGroupingLvl_Description
data.value: Create multiple groups, each with a single field value, or define several fields in the same group.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ChooseColumns_Description
data.value: Select the columns you want to display within your report.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ChooseReportType_Description
data.value: Select the report type you wish to create.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_SelectReportData_Description
data.value: Select the report data member and data fields that will supply data to your report.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_MasterDetailSelectReportData_Description
data.value: Select one or more data members to assign to the report and its detail reports. Choose fields to display in these reports.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_MasterDetailAddGroupingLevel_Description
data.value: Group data in the selected reports. You can specify one or more fields for each group.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_MasterDetailChooseSummaryOptions_Description
data.value: Choose summary functions to calculate in reports.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ChooseSummaryOptions_Description
data.value: What summary functions would you like to calculate?

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ChooseTableOrView_Description
data.value: The table or view you choose determines which columns will be available in your report.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_LabelInformation_Description
data.value: Select one of the predefined labels by specifying the Product and its ID

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_LabelOptions_Description
data.value: You can adjust the label's parameters here if required.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ReportComplete_Description
data.value: We have all the information needed to process the report.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ReportLayout_Description
data.value: The report layout specifies the manner in which selected data fields are arranged on individual pages.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ReportStyle_UnexpectedBehavior
data.value: Unexpected behavior: none of the style is selected.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ReportStyle_Description
data.value: The report style specifies the appearance of your report.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_AlignLeft1
data.value: Align Left 1

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_AlignLeft2
data.value: Align Left 2

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_Columnar
data.value: Columnar

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_Justified
data.value: Justified

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_Outline1
data.value: Outline 1

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_Outline2
data.value: Outline 2

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_Stepped
data.value: Stepped

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_Layout_Tabular
data.value: Tabular

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ChooseDSType_Description
data.value: Select the data source type.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ChooseReportTemplate_Description
data.value: Choose a template for your report.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_MapReportTemplateFields_Description
data.value: Map the data source fields to the fields available in the template. You can use drag and drop or specify the required values in the drop-down Template Field Value lists.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_MapReportTemplateFieldsToStaticValues_Description
data.value: Set the fields available in the template to static values.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_SpecifyReportTemplateOptions_Description
data.value: Specify the report options.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ConfigureReportTemplateQuery_Description
data.value: Choose one of the available tables/views/stored procedures or create a custom query. Template field values can be static or bound to the data fields selected on this page.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_SelectReportTemplateDataMember_Description
data.value: Select the report data member.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ConfigureReportPageSettings_Description
data.value: Specify report page settings.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ChooseReportColorSchemePage_Description
data.value: Choose a report color scheme.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_ConfigureCrossTabPage_Description
data.value: Drop fields onto cross-tab areas to define the report's layout.

data.name: ReportBoxDesignerStringId.Wizard_SelectCrossTabDataMemberPage_Description
data.value: Select a data member.
